properties.entry: SELECT U.USER_NO , U.ITEM_NO , U.ITEM_CATEGORY , U.EQUIP_ITEM_YN , S.ITEM_NAME , S.ITEM_IMG FROM USER_INVENTORY_LIST U JOIN STORE S ON(U.ITEM_NO = S.ITEM_NO) WHERE U.USER_NO = ?
SELECT A.TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENTS , B.USER_NICKNAME , A.ENROLLDATE FROM BOARD_LIST A JOIN USER_INFORMATION B ON(A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE A.BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT A.COMMENT_CONTENT , B.USER_NICKNAME FROM COMMENT_BOARD A JOIN USER_INFORMATION B ON(A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE A.BOARD_NO = ?
INSERT INTO COMMENT_BOARD ( BOARD_NO , COMMENT_NO , COMMENT_CONTENT , USER_NO ) VALUES ( ? , SEQ_COMMENT.NEXTVAL , ? , ? )
